data.title: Carnival Of Excess [Expanded Edition]
data.meta_description: GG Allin's swan song is wild, raw and unlike anything he has done before! Featuring takes on the Warren Zevon classic Carmelita and Pick Me Up (On Your Way Down) made famous by Patsy Cline, these are some of GG's final recordings. Allin was extremely pleased with his outlaw country album and claimed Carnival Of Excess as his favorite recording ever!
data.text:
GG Allin's swan song is wild, raw and unlike anything he has done before! Featuring takes on the Warren Zevon classic Carmelita and Pick Me Up (On Your Way Down) made famous by Patsy Cline, these are some of GG's final recordings. Allin was extremely pleased with his outlaw country album and claimed Carnival Of Excess as his favorite recording ever!

Track Listing

Outskirts of Life

Fuck Authority

Carmelita

Guns Bitches Brawls & Bottles

Son Of Evil

Watch Me Kill

The Snake Man

Pick Me Up (on your way down)

No Rights

Borrowed Time

GG and Tiny Tim on Carnival of Excess

GG's Vision

Parole Chat - Part 1

Parole Chat - Part 2

Bonus Materials

Official web site: http://www.ggcoe.com
